title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance to erase his criminal history.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into chaos.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
plot: A former assassin seeks revenge on her ex-colleagues who betrayed her.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
plot: A concierge and a lobby boy get caught up in the theft of a priceless painting and a murder mystery.

title: Django Unchained
plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife.

title: Tenet
plot: Armed with only one word, Tenet, a man fights for the survival of the world in a twilight world of international espionage.
